about_the_game:
Welcome to the age of hysteria, where a confused doctor finds himself in the confines of an asylum riddled with monsters of an unknown world. As you navigate through the abandoned and filthy rooms of the institute to unravel the asylum's tragic secrets, piercing together fragmented memories and disturbing documents, the succubi lurk in the shadows, testing your willpower and sanity. Resist their temptations to uncover the mysteries surrounding the institute - and yourself...

...or succumb to the darkness within.

Cycle of Corruption is an erotic horror adventure game where you will have to complete your mission and unravel the mystery surrounding the asylum, all the while trying to avoid the deadly succubi roaming the facility. Some of them will kill you on the spot, some may play around with you and some may even seem friendly... but the bottom line is, you can never trust a single attractive female in this area, so if you encounter one, there's only one sensible thing you can do: run!

While exploring, you will have to complete several puzzles obstructing your way forward and collect tidbits of information that will help you uncover just what on Earth has happened to the institute, and most importantly - about yourself.

  • A creepy, abandoned asylum full of mystery, puzzles and secrets waiting for you to explore.

  • Evade, struggle against or hide from the dangerous succubi roaming around.

  • 30+ unique handcrafted, high quality and super sexy pixel animations.

  • Voice acting for all characters.

  • A wide range of girls waiting for you in their own areas, each with their own unique story and personality to discover.

  • Multiple endings.

  • Vibrating smart toy integration through Intiface.

  • Hard mode for additional challenges.

content_descriptors.notes:
Cycle of Corruption is a horror puzzle adventure with explicit sexual content that is only intended for adults!
The game includes 2D fantasy representation of the following sexual themes:

Non-consensual sex, extreme sexual violence, energy drain through sex, death by sex, sex with multiple partners, sex with non human fantasy species (demons, imps, etc.)

The game contains mild horroristic elements, sudden loud sound effects, sudden screen flashes.

All characters are over the age of 18.

name: Cycle of Corruption

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display
